price: A sọ pé: “Iná, di tútù àti àlàáfíà lára ’Ibrọ̄hīm.”
arabic: قُلۡنَا يَٰنَارُ كُونِي بَرۡدٗا وَسَلَٰمًا عَلَىٰٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qul'nā yānāru kūnī bardan wasalāman ʿalā ib'rāhīma
